dashboard.title: Intelligent Student Services Dashboard
dashboard.description: Real-time monitoring and management of student interactions, enrollment inquiries, and academic support requests with comprehensive analytics and automated response tracking.
features: Live call monitoring with sentiment analysis

consultation.title: AI Academic Consultations
consultation.description: Sophisticated AI-powered consultations that provide personalized academic guidance, course recommendations, and comprehensive support for student success throughout their educational journey.
features: Personalized Course Planning: AI analyzes student transcripts, interests, and career goals to recommend optimal course sequences
Academic Progress Tracking: Real-time monitoring of degree completion status with early intervention for at-risk students
Career Guidance Integration: Connect academic choices with career outcomes using industry data and alumni success stories

section.title: Transform Your Business
section.description: Experience the power of AI-driven automation in your industry.
